content: Watch his movements carefully to see if he goes back to his default positioning. If he comes out of the jump attack by pulling his blade around with him, he'll follow up with two spinning slashes that need to be avoided to deflected to stop him in his tracks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Non-Pure.md', within the main section titled 'Non-Pure', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Non-Pure' and the sub-subsection 'Non-Pure Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Watch his movements carefully to see if he goes back to his default positioning. If he comes out of the jump attack by pulling his blade around with him, he'll follow up with two spinning slashes that need to be avoided to deflected to stop him in his tracks.
